com.percussion.loader
Interface IPSContentTreeNode

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
public interface IPSContentTreeNode
extends Serializable

The source scanner in the Content Loader will return a tree reflecting the source (e.g. a web site or a file system). This interface specifies all functionality needed for a content tree node.

Method Detail

getRoot

IPSContentTreeNode getRoot()
Get the root node for this. If this node is the root, it will return itself.

Returns:
the root node, never null.

addChild

void addChild(IPSContentTreeNode child)
Adds a new child to this node. The parent of the supplied child will be reset to this node.

Parameters:
child - the new child to add, not null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied child is null.

remove

IPSContentTreeNode remove(IPSContentTreeNode child)
Removes the supplied child from this node. The parent of the removed node will be reset to null.

Parameters:
child - the child that needs to be removed from this node, not null.
Returns:
the removed child node or null if not found.

getChildren

Iterator getChildren()
Get all children of this node.

Returns:
an iterator of IPSContentTreeNode objects, never null, might be empty.

hasChildren

boolean hasChildren()
Does this node have children?

Returns:
true if this node has children, false otherwise.

getParents

Iterator getParents()
Get the parents of this node.

Returns:
an iterator of IPSContentTreeNode objects, never null, might be empty.

removeParent

void removeParent(IPSContentTreeNode parent)
Removes a specified parent from current parent list.

Parameters:
parent - The to be removed parent node, it may not be null

isRoot

boolean isRoot()
Determines if the current node is one of the roots.

Returns:
true if the node does not have a parent; otherwise return false.

addParent

void addParent(IPSContentTreeNode parent)
Add a parent to this node.

Parameters:
parent - a new parent for this node, may not be null.

terminateBranch

void terminateBranch(IPSContentTreeNode existing)
This method terminates a tree branch. This is done if a reference is found to an object that is already part of another branch.

Parameters:
existing - a reference to the existing reference found in another branch. Set this to null to de-terminate the branch.

isBranchTerminated

boolean isBranchTerminated()
Is this branch terminated?

Returns:
true if terminated, false otherwise.

getBranchTerminatingNode

IPSContentTreeNode getBranchTerminatingNode()
Get terminal node.

Returns:
the branch terminating node, may be null if this branch is not terminated.

exclude

void exclude(boolean exclude)
Exclude or include this node from the upload process.

Parameters:
exclude - true to exclude this node from the upload process, false otherwise.

isExcluded

boolean isExcluded()
Is this node excluded from the upload process?

Returns:
true if this node is excluded from the upload process, false otherwise.

setItemContext

void setItemContext(PSItemContext item)
Sets the item context for this node.

Parameters:
item - the item context, not null.

getItemContext

PSItemContext getItemContext()
Gets the item context of thsi node.

Returns:
the item context, never null.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if this method is called before the setItemContext(PSItemContext) method has been called.
